title: SWORD ART ONLINE
description: Thousands of people are being caught the virtual reality of a MMORPG until they manage to complete the whole game. The story follows an expert player trying to decide of his place in this new world.
warning: Quality massively drops after the first arc, you are well advised to stop watching after it
